name: lib/router.mjs
patchEmitter
description: Catches all events on event emitter passed to the function

params.name: emitter
params.description: websocket/socket.io(client/server)/event emitter to intercept all incoming events

params.name: handler
params.description: socket.io like middleware (calls handler with packet and next)

name: routerMiddleware
description: Returns socket.io like middleware function to handle incoming events based on their path

name: EventRouter
description: Responds to events based on their route and a router

name: ./README.md
./README.md
./manual/overview.md
./manual/usage.md
content:
# Frequently Asked Questions

## Scaling

- **How do I scale and descale my inputs?**
  - The library is only for model create, data engineering and modeling is typically handled elsewhere
  - Check out the regression examples (hint: use [ModelScript](https://repetere.github.io/modelscript/)).
- **How do I cross validate, test/train split, K-fold, etc?**
  - (See above) The library is only for model create, data engineering and modeling is typically handled elsewhere
  - Check out the code examples (hint: use [ModelScript](https://repetere.github.io/modelscript/)).

name: ./CHANGELOG.md
content:
# Changelog

## 1.0.0 (2018-07-30)

- **Feat**
  - First Initial Release
- **Fix**
  - N/A
- **Chore**
  - Allow for multistep future forecasts in multivariate timeseries.
  - Add basic clustering example.
